description:
Kismet is the leader in AI driven hotel search. Find live hotel data for any of our listed hotels. 
- Search using semantic queries for "Boutique Dog Friendly  [Hotels] in Charleston"
- Find rate and inventory information
- Get direct access to booking pages in your chat.
